job_history.work_description: Primarily responsible for balance sheet account reconciliations including Accounts Payable and Accounts Receivable, and complete allocations on a monthly basis. Also handled daily transactions and journal entries, Job Costing and Reporting.

Handling of update tasks to ledgers and carried out journal entries transaction, customer ledger, cash receipts. Providing financial, administrative and clerical services in order to ensure effective, efficient and accurate financial and administrative operations.
Preparation of day books. Bank reconciliation. Stock estimation. Two way comparison).Income and expense entries into the accounting system. Maintained ledgers and accounting records.
